meanings.definition: A person who formulates or creates something, especially a plan or theory.
meanings.sent1: The formulator of the recipe carefully measured each ingredient.
meanings.sent2: The formulator of the business strategy presented a detailed plan.
meanings.sent3: The formulator of the new dance routine added a funny twist at the end.
meanings.sent4: As a formulator of ideas, she mixed creativity with practicality.
meanings.sent5: The formulator of the secret potion worked late into the night to perfect it.

meanings.definition: A company or organization that develops and produces products or solutions.
meanings.sent1: The formulator released a new line of skincare products.
meanings.sent2: The formulator in the lab created innovative solutions for everyday problems.
meanings.sent3: The formulator of the new software update had the whole team laughing with their jokes.
meanings.sent4: The formulator of the winning formula led the company to great success.
meanings.sent5: The formulator of the delicious snack bar used high-quality ingredients for perfection.
